get.description: Get all jobs associated with a specific database management ID
get.summary: Get jobs by database management ID

get.description: Get the current status of all background jobs. Supports optional pagination via query parameters 'page' and 'page_size'

parameters.description: Number of items per page (optional, default: 10)
parameters.name: page_size

delete.description: Remove a job from the monitoring system (typically for completed or failed jobs)

post.description: Allow external services to report job completion with file data

get.description: Get the current status of a background job
Retrieves all groups assigned to a specific actor

post.description: Starts background jobs to execute backup steps (dump, binlog check, etc.) via VeloArtifact. Each step is executed as a separate background job. For dump type with fileName, supports both OS commands (os_execute) and SQL commands (execute). For other types like check_binlog, all steps are SQL commands.

parameters.description: Backup request with hex-encoded command containing steps
parameters.name: request

200.description: Background jobs started successfully with job IDs

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

500.description: Internal server error during backup execution

post.description: Tests connection to database and updates status in the system
Creates a new database actor management entry with specified parameters

400.description: Invalid request body, validation error, or invalid IP address

post.description: Creates all database actors for the specified connection management ID
post.summary: Create all database actors for connection management

put.description: Updates an existing database actor management entry by ID

delete.description: Deletes an existing database actor management entry by ID

post.description: Creates a new database management entry with specified parameters

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

post.description: Creates all databases for the specified connection management ID
post.summary: Create all databases for connection management

delete.description: Deletes an existing database management entry by ID

post.description: Creates a new database object management entry with specified parameters

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

get.description: Retrieves all database objects associated with the specified connection management ID
get.summary: Get database objects by connection management ID

get.description: Retrieves all database objects associated with the specified database management ID
get.summary: Get database objects by database management ID

put.description: Updates an existing database object management entry by ID

delete.description: Deletes an existing database object management entry by ID

post.description: Creates a new database policy with specified parameters

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

post.description: Deletes multiple database policies by IDs. Revokes permissions via SqlUpdateDeny for enabled policies before removing records. Returns count of successfully deleted policies and list of failed IDs if any.

200.description: Bulk delete completed with success/failure details

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

post.description: Compares existing policies with desired state (Cartesian product of policy_defaults Ã— objects) and executes changes via VeloArtifact background job. Only updates database after successful remote execution to ensure atomic consistency.

parameters.description: Bulk policy update request with actor, policy defaults, and objects
parameters.name: request

200.description: Background job started with job ID and change summary

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

404.description: Referenced entity (cntmgt, dbmgt, actor, policy, object) not found

500.description: Internal server error during job creation or VeloArtifact execution

get.description: Starts background job to generate database policies for all databases under specified connection management ID

200.description: Background job started message with job ID

get.description: Starts background job to generate database policies for specified database management ID

200.description: Background job started message with job ID

put.description: Updates an existing database policy by ID

delete.description: Deletes an existing database policy by ID. Revokes permissions via SqlUpdateDeny before removing policy record.

post.description: Starts background job to download file from server to agent. If source_path is a directory, it will be compressed to tar.gz before sending. The agent will verify MD5 hash and extract compressed files automatically.

parameters.description: Download request with connection ID, source path, and save path
parameters.name: request

200.description: Download job started successfully with job ID

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

500.description: Internal server error during download execution

get.description: Retrieves all active database groups. Optional filter by database type ID.

post.description: Creates a new database group with specified parameters. Group code must be unique.

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

get.description: Retrieves a database group with specified ID

put.description: Updates an existing database group with specified ID. Code must remain unique.

400.description: Invalid group ID or request body

delete.description: Deletes a database group and all its associations. Cannot delete groups with child groups.

get.description: Retrieves all active actors assigned to a database group

post.description: Assigns multiple actors to a database group. Sends VeloArtifact allow commands to clients before updating database. Supports partial success - if some VeloArtifact operations fail, the operation continues with successful ones. Returns detailed execution status including success/failure information for each VeloArtifact job.

200.description: Actors assigned with detailed execution status

500.description: All VeloArtifact operations failed or actor assignment failed

delete.description: Removes multiple actors from a database group. Sends VeloArtifact deny commands to clients before updating database. Supports partial success - if some VeloArtifact operations fail, the operation continues with successful ones. Returns detailed execution status including success/failure information for each VeloArtifact job.

200.description: Actors removed with detailed execution status

500.description: All VeloArtifact operations failed or actor removal failed

put.description: Updates both policies and actors for a group with minimal VeloArtifact executions. This is the optimized alternative to individual assignment operations.

200.description: Group assignments updated successfully with optimization details

get.description: Retrieves group details along with assigned policies and actors
Retrieves all active policies assigned to a database group

post.description: Assigns multiple policies to a database group

delete.description: Removes multiple policies from a database group

post.description: Creates a new Oracle Pluggable Database on the remote server and registers it locally

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

post.description: Queries DBA_PDBS on the remote Oracle server and synchronizes local PDB records
post.summary: Synchronize all PDBs for CDB connection

put.description: Executes ALTER PLUGGABLE DATABASE on the remote Oracle server

delete.description: Drops a Pluggable Database on the remote Oracle server and removes local record

post.description: Assigns a single policy to multiple database groups. Returns partial success if some groups fail.

parameters.description: Group IDs to assign policy to
parameters.name: groups

200.description: Policy assigned to all groups successfully

206.description: Policy assigned to some groups (partial success)

get.description: Retrieves all groups assigned to a specific policy

post.description: Initiates policy compliance check for the specified connection management ID
Kills a specific database session using connection management ID and session ID

200.description: Kill session command executed successfully for session ID on connection ID

post.description: Starts background job to upload file from client to server via VeloArtifact. The upload operation uses the source job ID to locate the file on the client, then uploads it to the specified path on the server.

parameters.description: Upload request with connection ID, source job ID, file name, and file path
parameters.name: request

200.description: Upload job started successfully with job ID

400.description: Invalid request body or validation error

500.description: Internal server error during upload execution

error.example: policy IDs list cannot be empty
cannot delete group with child groups. Found 2 child groups
failed to assign policies to group

message.example: connection management with id=123 not found
Upload job started successfully for file: backup_20240101.sql
